modName: Gimli son of Gloin (Custom Voiced) - DELETED
summary:
Gimli son of Gloin, a hardy Dwarf warrior from Erebor, visits Skyrim in his Journeys!
He is in Riverwood, in the Sleeping Giant's Inn, drinking some good beer.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#38761d][font=Trebuchet MS]Gimli son of Gloin can be found in the Sleeping Giant's Inn in Riverwood, mostly sitting at a table or mixing potions at the Alchemy Lab.
Have fun adventuring with him through Skyrim![/font]
[/color]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=931946440][color=#b45f06]Mod site of the Steam Workshop[/color][/url]
[color=#00ffff]
[u][size=3]How to install:[/size][/u]

Simply copy the contents of the Data Folder into your Data folder (For Steam Users: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data).

If you already have one of the mods listed in the Credits, it may ask you if you want to replace the files with the same names. It shouldn't be a problem if you accept![/color]


[color=#ffff00][size=3][u]Bugs:[/u][/size]

- When you tell Gimli to follow you, wait till he stands up from his bench! He will then get smaller to his Dwarf size, and he is then fully functional. If you leave the Inn before he stands up, he will likely be the same height as you, which makes him glitchy.

- If Gimli does not appear with you after you fast travelled, try fast travelling back to Riverwood (or your last destination) and then try to fast travel again. If that doesn't work, I suggest restarting the game, it really does help!

- If Gimli disappears and isn't in the Sleeping Giant's Inn, you probably need to restart the game and he'll be there again.

- If you sneak at an enemy camp, and they detect you, it may happen that Gimli stays crouched forever even if you stand up again. I sadly don't have a solution except to load your last saved game / restart the game :/

- If you encounter any other bugs, or found a way to solve them, please share them in the Comments Section![/color]
